comment: I had her for Decom I, and she was great. She explains each topic clearly and makes it a class that everyone could understand and do well. What was very helpful was the videos that she did throughout the semester covering all the material in case we missed one step, which in certain times were very helpful. I would definitely take her again. 10/10

You are making an Excellent choice if you are taking Professor Okcu for Decom. She is extremely helpful, flexible and cares a lot about your success, not only in her class, but all your other studio classes. Overall, the exercises are easy and understandable. I would 100% recommend her as a Decom Professor.

Excellent professor, checks all the boxes:

1. Responsive
2. Easy to work with
3. Detailed and thorough
4. Open to many clarifications

Best professor that you can take for Design Communication I and II. She will help you in an effective and minute fashion just to get you to understand even a small concept. Very thorough and very helpful. 5/5.

Absolutely difficult to work with. She'll tell you to do one thing then completely changes her mind and makes you figure out what she wants. Ive asked questions multiple times and she just walks away. She's very childish and gets frustrated if you ask for clarification multiple times.

Man, what can I say. I usually don't come and write reviews on... anything, really, but man I really need to emphasize that if you take DCOMM, PLEASE PLEASE take Okcu! She will help you with absolutely ANYTHING and explain EVERYTHING in detail without showing a hint of frusturation. Not only this, but she is VERY accessible outside of class! 10/10!

Overall an amazing teacher she stays after class if you need help with anything. She will actually go over things that you may have missed in past years or if you can't remember how to do it she will show you right quick. She understands that studio may come first in some instances but if you want to get an A you will have to put in the work.

I took Decom I with Professor Okcu and I wouldn't have it any other way! She was VERY clear with her grading criteria and what she was looking for. Decom is a very fast paced class, but every single one of her lectures really helped, she goes very in depth into the material. She was willing to work with me in order to help me succeed :)
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: As with any studio class, prepare to work hard. She gives you feedback whether you want it or not, but it's always to help you. She's not the most organized, but it's not to the point where it's painful. I highly recommend her for first-year studio. She's a great person and pretty funny once you get to know her.

I had her for Studio 1, and she was great. She takes the time to really listen to what you are struggling with to help you improve your designs and projects. She gives very straight forward feedback and specific ideas for improvement which is very helpful at the beginning of the ARCH degree.
She is one of the best. Just be ready to work hard.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Even though this is a part 1 of 2 class, Okcu expects students to submit high quality work. She gives all the skills necessary to complete the assignments. Don't miss a online submission! Just turn something in! At the end of the semester she lets you resubmit all the assignments, and she will only grade the final version you submit.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Okcu is a very caring person and she is willing to help her students individually if you ask her. Do not skip class because you will fail! Okcu expects high quality work so do not be lazy. She is very blunt, but thats because she believes you can do better. If something is wrong, speak with her and she will work with you.
